fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom
Interface QueryRetrieveSCPListener

All Superinterfaces:
QuerySCPListener
public interface QueryRetrieveSCPListener
extends QuerySCPListener

An Object implementing QueryRetrieveSCPListener is the user-contributed part of a Query/Retrieve SCP.

See Also:
QueryRetrieveSCP

Method Summary
 void queryReceived(QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation op)
          Called by QueryRetrieveSCP within the association thread when a C-FIND is received.
 void retrieveReceived(QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation op)
          Called by QueryRetrieveSCP in a dedicated thread when a C-GET or C-MOVE is received.
 boolean supportsSyntax(String syn)
          Must returns true or false whether the specified abstract syntax UID is supported by this object or not.
 

Method Detail

queryReceived

public void queryReceived(QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation op)
Called by QueryRetrieveSCP within the association thread when a C-FIND is received. The QuerySCP.Operation.identifier field of the Operation passed to queryReceived contains the identifier of the query. This method must call QuerySCP.Operation.sendQueryResponsePending(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.Identifier) for each match, and QuerySCP.Operation.sendQueryResponseFinal() when the matching process is complete.

retrieveReceived

public void retrieveReceived(QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation op)
Called by QueryRetrieveSCP in a dedicated thread when a C-GET or C-MOVE is received. The QuerySCP.Operation.identifier field of the Operation passed to retrieveReceived contains the identifier of the request. This method must write DICOM objects for each match using a DicomWriter with the specified Operation as the writer output. It must call QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation.sendRetrieveResponseFinal() when there is no more objects to send. Optionally, it may calls serveral times QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation.sendRetrieveResponsePending(int) to notify the SCU of the number of remaining objects to transfer.

supportsSyntax

public boolean supportsSyntax(String syn)
Must returns true or false whether the specified abstract syntax UID is supported by this object or not. If this object supports queries using standard information models, this method must return true for at least one of UID.PatientRootQueryRetrieveInformationModelFind, UID.StudyRootQueryRetrieveInformationModelFind and UID.PatientStudyOnlyQueryRetrieveInformationModelFind. If this object supports retrievals using standard information models, this method must return true for at least one of: UID.PatientRootQueryRetrieveInformationModelMove, UID.StudyRootQueryRetrieveInformationModelMove and UID.PatientStudyOnlyQueryRetrieveInformationModelMove. If this method returns true for one of the Move UID, it must returns true for the corresponding Get UID.

Specified by:
supportsSyntax in interface QuerySCPListener
